devdoc.details: Implements AggregatorV3Interface to mimic being a Chainlink price feed      Uses the same composition logic as RedstoneChainlinkCompositeWrapperWithThresholding

params._sourceFeed1: Address of the first source Chainlink price feed
params._sourceFeed2: Address of the second source Chainlink price feed

getRoundData(uint80).details: IMPORTANT: Due to Chainlink round ID divergence between feeds, this aggregator only supports latest data.      Historical round queries are not supported and will always return the latest available data.      Use latestRoundData() for the most recent price information.

returns.answer: The composite price with target decimals
returns.answeredInRound: The round in which the answer was computed
returns.startedAt: The timestamp when the round started
returns.updatedAt: The timestamp when the round was updated

returns.answer: The composite price with target decimals
returns.answeredInRound: The round in which the answer was computed
returns.startedAt: The timestamp when the round started
returns.updatedAt: The timestamp when the round was updated

devdoc.title: ChainlinkCompositeAggregator

PriceIsStale().notice: Error thrown when price is stale

ZeroFeedAddress().notice: Error thrown when a feed address is zero

CHAINLINK_BASE_CURRENCY_UNIT().notice: Base currency unit for price normalization (10^8)

constructor.notice: Constructor to initialize the composite wrapper

decimals().notice: Target decimals for composite price (Chainlink standard: 8)

description().notice: Returns the description of the composite feed

getRoundData(uint80).notice: Gets data for a specific round

latestRoundData().notice: Gets data for the latest round

version().notice: Returns the version of the original feed

userdoc.notice: Composes prices from two Chainlink price feeds with thresholding
